images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a stunning beach scene with sunsets and inviting waters.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and discounts, encouraging engagement and action from the audience.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting serene beaches, sunsets, and cultural elements of Thailand during autumn
highlighting Phuket, Krabi, and Bangkok with their unique features

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя осенний рай в Таиланде!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a stunning beach scene with sunsets and inviting waters.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
